title: Game won't disconnect after maintenance
body:
So I was disconnected roughly 3 hours ago for scheduled maintenance, the standard attempting to reconnect popped up. So I closed league, waited a few hours, noticed the status was back to normal and decided to log back in. Now it's constantly trying to reconnect me to that game and WON'T disconnect or let me browse another game >.< 

Any suggestions?

replies.body: I'm not currently seeing any issues with the game or logging servers, but there could be a problem causing your network to fail reaching us.  My suggestion would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help with troubleshooting and rule out possibilities.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in case any settings caused your connection to get blocked.  Let me know if it helps!

I'd love to say that's the problem, but the game disconnected due to maintenance. Having maintenance finished hours later, logging in presents me with an automatic reconnection to the game I was in PRE-MAINTENANCE. All it has is the reconnect button on the client.

Connection isn't the issue, it's the fact that the game I'm in still doesn't think it's ended.
Have the same problem, no idea what to do :(
